name: Dancer Girl Live Wallpaper
description:
This is an amazing lightweight live wallpaper engine with stunning 3D animation effects and exclusive functions.

With this wallpaper, you get a dancing girl on your desktop. She is so good at singing and dancing, double-clicking the mouse to get a new dance.
She is so charming, double-clicking the space key can switch a new cute body.
If you like, she can AI generate her faces as you like; she does not care about your past, but she provides you with AI chatting service.


Instructions:
Right-click the dancer to display the menu, the menu has a variety of functions to choose from
On the dancer, double-click the left mouse button to switch songs;
Double-click the space to switch the functions of different enchantresses.
Combining face-changing special effects with music and dancing, let's try it out.
